actions.text: Amendment SA 3858 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 3858 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Cassidy to Amendment SA 3695. (consideration: CR S5903; text: CR S5903) To require the Director of the NIH shall conduct a comprehensive study and submit to Congress a report that includes a portfolio analysis of current funding levels of the NIH related to mental health and substance use disorder.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3858 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3858 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Cassidy to Amendment SA 3695.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To require the Director of the NIH shall conduct a comprehensive study and submit to Congress a report that includes a portfolio analysis of current funding levels of the NIH related to mental health and substance use disorder.
